title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Language Simulation-Based Training with Exemplary Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and general understanding of motor learning
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can perform language operation learning tasks with 85% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can design and execute adaptive variations of language-motor strategies under constraints three or more times.
Learners can propose solutions to language-motor problems with 90% completeness through collaborative projects in a nonlinear learning environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
